column4: yea Journeyman i just needed a simple way of shareing files on my home network

no malicous users, yes i know it is diffrent to samba, diffrence that i like the most is pure-ftpd works & is set up easily, samba is a mission. yes jrib i know i should use the repositry's but u have to compile stuff some times, i mean other wise u never learn
you can use nfs, its fast and very reliable, and you can share with windows as well if you install windows services for unix from the microsoft website
